Values.value: select DISTINCT L.APPL_VALUE from BCMMGR.BCM_UNVRSL_VALUES_ORG_LKUP_L L where L.TYPE_CD IN (%FieldTypeCodeInString%) AND L.APPL_NM = '%ApplicationName%' AND L.UNVRSL_VALUE_CD IN (%UnivValueInString%) AND L.BUSNS_ORG_NM = '%BusinessOrganization%'

select DISTINCT UNVRSL_VALUE_CD from BCMMGR.BCM_UNVRSL_VALUES_ORG_LKUP_L L where L.TYPE_CD IN (%FieldTypeCodeInString%) AND L.APPL_NM = '%ApplicationName%' AND L.APPL_VALUE IN (%AppValueInString%) AND L.BUSNS_ORG_NM = '%BusinessOrganization%'
